name: Something to say, fella?
description:
In this dialogue based game, you choose only one word to use over the entire run and the situation in which everything will develop. There isn't an explicit victory nor defeat, but I guess that you will know what is and what isn't either of both (I also made sure that there weren't "dead ends"). The game is pretty short, but there is a different ending for each combination of choices, so try as many as you want. Just requires a keyboard.

I worked on it alone and thought hadn't that much time, so I had to cut out a lot of ideas and focus on transmit the essence clearly (also, didn't find music nor sounds that went right with the game, so it's mute). I think it's fine as the demo it is 👍

By the way, you can check my youtube channel here (there I upload my music and little more): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3SVl7OFdGcDlmMZbRDHhMQ/featured
